# IntentWidgetFamily.systemSmall

**Case**

A small widget.

## Declaration

```swift
case systemSmall
```

## Discussion

The small system widget can appear on the Home Screen or in the Today View in iOS and iPadOS, or in the Notification Center on macOS.
